dcterms:description: Libri-Light is a benchmark dataset for automatic speech recognition (ASR) that contains over 50,000 hours of unlabeled monolingual English speech data generated from audiobooks, designed for training models in a federated learning setup.
dcterms:title: Libri-Light

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: Librispeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audiobooks, providing a large dataset for training and evaluating speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Librispeech

dcterms:creator: V. Pratap
Q. Xu
A. Sriram
G. Synnaeve
R. Collobert
dcterms:description: Multilingual Librispeech (MLS) is a large-scale multilingual dataset for speech research, providing resources for training ASR systems in multiple languages.
dcterms:title: Multilingual Librispeech (MLS)
